# What makes K-Dramas so popular globally?

<img src="diary1.png" width="300"/>

## Introduction

```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
kdrama_pop_2022 <- read.csv("k-drama-popularity-worldwide-2022.csv")

kdrama_pop_2022 <- data.frame(
  Category = c("Moderately popular", "Moderately popular", "Minority of enthusiasts", "Not many people consume it"),
  Percentage = c(36.10, 30, 22.70, 11.20)
)

library(plotly)

kdrama_2022pop_piechart <- plot_ly(data = kdrama_pop_2022, labels = ~Category, values = ~Percentage, type = "pie")

kdrama_2022pop_piechart <- kdrama_2022pop_piechart %>% layout(title = "Popularity of K-dramas Worldwide in 2022")

kdrama_2022pop_piechart <- kdrama_2022pop_piechart %>% layout(paper_bgcolor = "white")

kdrama_2022pop_piechart <- kdrama_2022pop_piechart %>% layout(hoverinfo = "label+percent")

show(kdrama_2022pop_piechart)
```
